node.title: Basics for True Education
node.description: Come and learn about the ABCs of true education. The breakout session “Education on the Farm” is designed to help parents follow the counsel that we have about how to educate our children. You can expect practical applications on how to incorporate agriculture and homeschooling. Whether you are a farmer, gardener or just beginning to contemplate moving to the country, you will gain a blessing from this breakout session. We encourage you to bring the whole family! There will be time for hands­on activities for your children to enjoy!
